About Me

I'm a Senior Fullstack Engineer with expertise in building high-performance web applications and distributed systems. My work spans from frontend experiences to backend architecture, always focusing on scalability and maintainability.

Currently, I specialize in cloud-native development, microservices architecture, and real-time data processing. I believe in writing clean, testable code and fostering collaborative team environments.
